issue.title: [CI] Fix docker python build
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5739](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5739). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
python docker image will fail to clean the build directory, installing a previous invocation of `docker-compose run python`. This is not affecting CI that drops the `/build` mount, but only local users.
